title: AU Deals: A Meta Quest 3S 256 Drop, The Most Monster Savings on Hunter Wilds, Civ VII, and More!
description: It could be your best time to drop into VR with this decent Meta Quest 3S saving!
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: It could be your best time to drop into VR with this decent Meta Quest 3S saving!
text: The bargain hunt is on and wild.We're not even 10 days into 2025, and the gaming deals are heating up already. At the tip of that spear are the cheapest preorder prices for the next big upcomings on my radar‚ÄîMonster Hunter Wilds, Sniper Elite Resistance, and Kingdom Come Deliverance II. Without saying too much too soon, I've played parts of at least two of those three titles, and I think they're coming along quite well. And now I'll shut right up. In retro news, I‚Äôm celebrating the 22nd birthday of Street Fighter Alpha 3 on GBA, a pretty incredible port of the PS One version. Though the BGMs and voice SFX weren‚Äôt always authentic, and the fighters had fewer animation frames, Crawfish Interactive otherwise shoryukened this shoehorned-down port out of the park. I got much RSI of the thumbs playing this on the go (especially using the ‚Äúportable only‚Äù fighter additions of Yun, Eagle, Ingrid, and Maki). That progressed to early-onset arthritis when a mate got his own cart and a Ryu/Ken rivalry ensued via Game Link Cable.As a general rule, I Maki no friends with Dan. html:
The bargain hunt is on and wild.

We're not even 10 days into 2025, and the gaming deals are heating up already. At the tip of that spear are the cheapest preorder prices for the next big upcomings on my radar‚ÄîMonster Hunter Wilds, Sniper Elite Resistance, and Kingdom Come Deliverance II. Without saying too much too soon, I've played parts of at least two of those three titles, and I think they're coming along quite well. And now I'll shut right up.

In retro news, I‚Äôm celebrating the 22nd birthday of Street Fighter Alpha 3 on GBA, a pretty incredible port of the PS One version. Though the BGMs and voice SFX weren‚Äôt always authentic, and the fighters had fewer animation frames, Crawfish Interactive otherwise shoryukened this shoehorned-down port out of the park. I got much RSI of the thumbs playing this on the go (especially using the ‚Äúportable only‚Äù fighter additions of Yun, Eagle, Ingrid, and Maki). That progressed to early-onset arthritis when a mate got his own cart and a Ryu/Ken rivalry ensued via Game Link Cable.

This Day in Gaming üéÇ

Aussie birthdays for notable games.

- Street Fighter Alpha 3 (GBA) 2003. Redux

- Story of Seasons (3DS) 2016. Get

Slay the Spire

9/10, Amazing. Slay the Spire takes some of the best parts of deckbuilding games, roguelikes, and dungeon crawlers, and mixes them into a wholly new and extremely satisfying package.
